scripts.doc: ./node_modules/.bin/nomnoml -i docs/file-system.nomnoml -o docs/file-system.png && ./node_modules/.bin/nomnoml -i docs/slave-model.nomnoml -o docs/slave-model.png && ./node_modules/.bin/nomnoml -i docs/slave-collection.nomnoml -o docs/slave-collection.png && ./node_modules/.bin/docco backbone.composite-model.js
scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint backbone.composite-model.js test/*.js examples/file-system/*.js && ./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma-global.conf.js  && ./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma-amd.conf.js ./node_modules/.bin/qunit -c backbone.composite-model.js -t test/tests.js
